title: ISR Drone Asset Planning
description: An ISR planner must create a flight plan for a surveillance drone to cover multiple intelligence collection targets.

tasks.description: Input the coordinates and priority of all intelligence collection targets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately enters all target information.

tasks.description: Generate an optimal flight path that covers all targets while minimizing flight time and exposure to threats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates an efficient and safe flight plan.

tasks.description: Task the drone with the finalized flight plan and sensor collection settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully sends the mission plan to the drone control station.
